Trade/Device Name(s): PTS PANELS CHOL+HDL+GLU Panel Test Strips
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Colorimetric enzymatic (cholesterol esterase/oxidase) trinder method for cholesterol
Colorimetric enzymatic (cholesterol esterase/oxidase) trinder method for HDL
Colorimetric enzymatic (glucose oxidase) method for glucose
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for PTS PANELS CHOL+HDL+GLU Panel Test Strips for simultaneous measurement of cholesterol, HDL, and glucose in whole blood using dry chemistry.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use by professionals and individuals at home to measure cholesterol, HDL cholesterol, and glucose in whole blood for diagnosis and management of lipid and carbohydrate metabolism disorders.
